greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of 2*BernoulliB[2*(n+1)]*(4^(n+1)-1)/(2*(n+1))] divided by numerator of the series coefficients of 1/(1 + Cosh[x]).
comment: This sequence is related to the sequences of the numerators and denominators of the Taylor series for tan(x), i.e., A002430 and A036279, and the similar sequences A160469 and A156769. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, May 24 2009
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
formula: For n>=0, a(n)=c(n+1) where c(n)=numerator((4^n-1)*B(2*n)/n)/numerator((4^n-1)*B(2*n)/(2*n)!), B(k) denotes the k-th Bernoulli number. - C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Dec 19 2004
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Dec 07 2003
